name: That Snowy Place
description: THAT SNOWY PLACE  a long time ago there are an happy family that live on a remote place, on a very cold day, the sister fell on very bad fiver and need treatment, so the parent decided to seek for help and leave the boy with his sister alone, but they never come back.   after many days the boy cant handle the stress anymore so he decided to go outside with his sister looking for someone to help.
